entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
